subject: Re: RE: Samba TP6?
body:
Tridge, Simo, et. al.

Please let us know when you are ready for us to begin GPO testing and other things.  I would be happy to get started as soon sa . . .

Matt

>From: simo 
>Date: 2007/06/22 Fri AM 11:32:55 CDT
>To: Krishna Ganugapati 
>Cc: Andrew Bartlett , Matt Schwartz , 
	tridge@samba.org, samba-technical@lists.samba.org
>Subject: RE: Samba TP6?

>On Fri, 2007-06-22 at 12:30 -0400, Krishna Ganugapati wrote:
>> That's awesome - are there plans to add ADSIEDIT.MSC?
>
>you know, we want to get to a point where samba4 is a complete AD DC, so
>the answer is yes, but I don't know when we will achieve that yet (it
>may already work right now or not).
>
>Simo.
>
>-- 
>Simo Sorce
>Samba Team GPL Compliance Officer
